The urea and sloe release fertilizer were passed through a 0.5-mm sieve after air-dried at 25 ± 1 °C. Total N, NH 4 + and NO 3 − concentrations in samples were determined according to Kjeldahl method
27 . Heavy metals and trace elements (Cd, Cu, Fe, Mn, Ni, Pb and Zn) content in samples were determined after digestion with aqua regia based on standard method
18, 32 .
